parsed.internal_thinking: It's the start of my turn and the dice haven't been rolled yet. My current setup is focused on a balanced production: Node 20 provides Brick (6), Sheep (8), and Wood (11), while Node 44 provides Wheat (9 and 6) and Ore (2). I have a road extending toward Node 10, which is an excellent high-yield spot (B6, S8, W12), and another toward Node 45, leading toward Node 35 (S11, Wh6, O3). My immediate goal is to collect resources to build a settlement on Node 10 to solidify my Brick and Sheep production. Since I have no Wood or Brick in hand, I need to roll the dice to start generating resources. Bob and Charlie have also secured decent spots, so I'll need to move efficiently toward the 3:1 port at Node 9 to maintain flexibility, especially given my low Ore roll (2). [Response was too brief]
parsed.note_to_self: Priority 1: Build settlement at Node 10 (B6, S8, W12). Priority 2: Expand to Node 9 for the 3:1 port. Priority 3: Monitor Bob's progress near the center (Node 41) to ensure he doesn't block my path toward the southern coast if I decide to expand there later.
parsed.say_outloud: Alright, let's see what the dice have in store for us! Good luck with the rolls, everyone.
